channel.title: [Resolved] Help! Has anyone used i3 and Pidgin?
channel.description:
I just got i3 and I looove it, but I can't seem to get Pidgin to work. The process will run, but no window shows up. Any ideas?
I could use `irssi`, but I really don't want to. I like pidgin.
